S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-1148 Client XA getTransactionIsolation() does not return the correct isolation level when rejoining a global transaction
Contributed by Deepa Remesh
Attaching a patch "derby-1148_10.1.diff" for 10.1 branch. There were conflicts with a direct merge, hence attaching a patch. With the patch, I ran derbynetclientmats using Sun jdk1.4.2 on Windows XP. No failures.
